roleset.name: cause to be more japanese-like

example.name: Corpus example
example.text: I am sure I am not the first to point out Joseph Hynes 's , ? Do Mistake ? Learn Better , ? -LSB- XV , 1 -RSB- mistakes *PRO* in Japanizing English words , e. g. , sei fu not ? safe-o , ? nain not ? nine-o . ?

roleset.note: JAPANIZE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on instance in ULA. No VNcls. (from japanize.01-v)
